However, it wasn't shipped the following week either and I had to reach out myself to actually get a different monitor altogether shipped. (Which I had to pay an upcharge for)

Communication was good when the tower was on back order, and when it arrived and was being built. Packing was good by reusing tower styrofoam/box as well as an additional box with bubble. Only issue is that the legs of the tower were bent (front and back). Though cosmetic it should have been noticed during assembly and not built/used.Wiring could be a bit better even though I selected the option for cable management. Screws and everything were good, nothing overtightened. Components were free from scratch and damage.No bloatware on imaged Win 11, but didn't use it since I imaged it with my own Win 10.
+ Decent Response from Support+ Desktop arrived on fine status and almost on schedule- The packing looks not perfect

Review.Titre: Exactly what I ordered... but a bit too exact
Review.Contenu: Exactly what I ordered... but a bit too exact.This is the 2nd CyberPowerPC I've gotten in the last decade. I've been happy with the previous experience so I got another one recently. The product arrived on time and to spec. However I would have appreciated some comms with the team based on my choices. For example, it turned out the cooling fan I accidentally picked was not good enough for the CPU I had picked, but CyberPowerPC didn't contact me to confirm if my choice was right. Also I was hoping I would have gotten all the manuals and cables that were not used from the motherboard box (e.g. SATA cables, extra screws for the case etc.) but unfortunately I didn't get anything else except for the PSU cables and the case trays for future 3.5" mounting.

The pricing combined with the customization options made it a no brainer to use Cyber Power as my custom builder. My previous gaming pc from several years ago was built by them and only the bottleneck caused by an old motherboard made me upgrade. Two thumbs up!

Review.Titre: The system is running smoothly and very…
Review.Contenu: The system is running smoothly and very quiet.I am happy with my purchase The I9 system.The Cyber PowerPC technician is doing good job.I give 4 stars for the review because the CyberPower center should send back all manuals which include with the manufactories (such as Mother board + Video card..)   together with the system.I will purchase again for next time.

Customer service was great for after sale updates and issues. Build quality was less than I expected even with paying extra for cable management (was poorly done). Prices was great. I priced out building my own and their price beat what I could build myself.

Great hardware. Neatly and properly built. Unfortunately, the BIOS arrived misconfigured rendering the PC unusable, and required several hours of my time to track down and fix the issue. Tech support didn't help me fix it over the phone, and instead suggested RMA (-1 star).

I received a very well-built PC. Components were correct as ordered and cable management was great. It arrived clean and not a fingerprint found anywhere. Performance is a 10 out of 10. This computer never gets hot and runs everything without a single glitch.  The only thing I don't like are the default fans as they are cheap and don't look great, and aren't connected to the MB. However, they are quiet and have good airflow. Would have preferred some different case options as well, such as NZXT H7 Flow. Overall, I'm happy.

Pros: So far after owning my computer for a few weeks it runs better than I could imagine.Cons: I wasn't told my computer was on hold due to the GPU I ordered to be installed was being delayed due to lack of availability. I only found out a week and a half after I placed the order and inquired via email. I also didn't receive my computer on time after paying for 3 day shipping. The shipping was rescheduled twice. While this is more an issue with UPS, I still ended up paying for 3 day shipping and receiving my computer 4 days later than originally promised.

Review.Titre: Customer service was good and Carlos…
Review.Contenu: Customer service was good and Carlos was very helpful in my return process. He got in touch and got me my return label within the next business day. Only reason for the 4 stars was the computer did not run properly and would crash on the smallest games such as among us and fall guys. And also games like Fortnite.

Review.Titre: PC was mostly set up correctly
Review.Contenu: PC was mostly set up correctly.  The only issue i encountered was that the graphics card has 2 cords, with one daisy chained in rather than 3 separate ones.  Doing some research, this can cause overheating and even fires in some cards.  Best course of action is to never chain 2 4 slot ports into one cable.

Review.Titre: Satisfied, but concerned about cooler installation.
Review.Contenu: PC arrived in working order and exactly when it was scheduled to arrive, with a week of building and testing then another week to ship it.However, the AIO liquid cooler is installed on the front of the case with the tubes on top, which is concerning.  Everything I've looked at says they should be on the bottom instead.

Over all the process was smooth.  They are rather inflexible though if anything is wrong.  I order 16 gig of ram without realizing that it would only be one stick.  This limits the RAM.  I asked to get another stick added or purchased they said they couldn't do that but I could cancel my order.  Seems silly to me.

Review.Titre: All in all,  an awesome experience
Review.Contenu: All in all an awesome experience. The tower is impressive, even immaculate. There is a need for more documentation and “how to” videos.  I spent more time researching how to turn off pulsating keyboard and mouse than I did setting the computer up.

Review.Titre: The process of customizing the build…
Review.Contenu: The process of customizing the build and placing the order was very easy and user friendly.  filling the order was timely with good email confirmations throughout the process keeping me informed about how things were progressing.  The shipping was much sooner than I expected and arrived unharmed.  The only thing that I frowned on was the upselling of pro wiring and extra packaging costs.  I don't think a client should pay more for piece of mind regarding a quality build and proper shipping.  Just because  these additional charges seem to be industry standard doesn't mean that CyberpowerPC has to do this also.  Charge everyone a few bucks more and just do it. Other than this very minor pet peev the experience was enjoyable.  I would highly recommend doing business with Cyberpower and will again myself.

Pros- PC arrived and it was working out of the box- Paid for professional wiring and it was superbCons- Didn't have the parts I ordered on hand and delayed the order by nearly a month. Additionally, I bought an rbg water cooler and got sent a non-rgb water cooler. - They refunded my laser engraving because the machine was down- not sure if mobo is busted the the built in bluetooth is awful

Buying the computer from cyberpowerPC was great. Their website is easy to navigate and I was able to select the exact parts I wanted. My issue has come after receiving my computer. The GPU was dead on arrival and now I'm working with customer service to get a new one. Other than the additional time to actually start using my new computer my experience has been pretty good.

Review.Titre: I was pleasantly surprised how fast my…
Review.Contenu: I was pleasantly surprised how fast my order arrived in Hawaii. I think it took only 8 days for the entire process. I have to be honest that i got a little worried after reading so many negative reviews about this company but so far my PC hasn’t shown any problems. The only gripe i have is some of the cabling isn’t well thought out but can easily be fixed.All in all very happy so far. I hope it lasts 😄🤞🏼
Allowed me to customize the kind of PC I wanted at a fair price. I do wish that additional financing options had been available that are offered by some other sites like Newegg or Bestbuy.

I received a stellar deal on my new rig, which is replacing my current MSI GT72S from 2016.Likes:- Great customization options, easy-to-use menu, staff were quick to respond and helpful on an issue I was having with ordering the liquid cooling kit from the website.- Unfortunately, the liquid cooling kit, while showing as in stock on the website, was on back order by the time my laptop shipped. Upon receipt of my laptop, I noticed it ran very warm at 95° C when running The Outer Worlds. Hopefully, when the kit arrives, that can fix the issue, though I understand that the i9 and 4090 both run very warm.

Recently purchased a new computer for use in video editing for my daughter's YouTube and TikTok. I was pleased with the ease I had in selecting components and customizing a PC to meet my needs. After ordering, I received numerous emails updating me throughout the building processes and I received the computer much quicker than I had thought. The computer came well-packaged and undamaged. Setup was easy; however, the computer did not come with a wall cord for the power supply. Not sure if that was an oversight or if the computers just do not come with power supply cords. Overall, I am happy with the purchase and the company. Will likely order again from them in the future

Review.Titre: Great PC with a small delay but great customer service…
Review.Contenu: Fast shipping though there was a hold up for a few days during assembly. When it was suppose to ship no status update until I messaged, they replied quickly, refunded my money for fast shipping and made it a priority build. Good customer service and quick to reply. That small delay and status update is the only reason I won’t give 5 stars but overall great!

The process was relatively simple and easy! The PC building part wasn't super user friendly, but other than that it was a positive experience! The PC arrived with no issues (although it was a bit tough to unpack) and everything works great. I also really appreciated the communication updates I got along each step of the building/shipping process.

The PC itself, at least in the first week of me using it, has been working very well. The only complaint I have was the credit card issues I had after ordering, where CyberPower was unable to verify the card I was planning on using. After that however the process was smooth.

Assembled and shipped quickly even without paying for rush. Desktop worked on arrival and benchmarked pretty good.Only issue, I bought 6 T30 phanteks but can't control a single one. The fans were never connected to the PWM pins on the motherboard. It runs at a fixed 2k RPMs at the moment which keeps it cool but it's a bit loud on idle.

Review.Titre: I am extremely happy with my PC
Review.Contenu: I am extremely happy with my PC. My only "complaint" would be that my RGB fans did not come with software to adjust the colors. However after a 5 minute chat with support they were able to direct me to the correct software I wanted. I do not remember the name of the person I chatted with but if you can find out, please give them kudos for their quick and helpful solution to my inquiry. Otherwise I am very happy and look forward to doing business with CyberPower when my next build is due.

Review.Titre: Great pc, came with broken keyboard
Review.Contenu: I have been very pleased with my order and everything looks great and is performing great as well. The only complaint that I have is that my keyboard supplied with the computer came to me with a broken key. Thankfully I already had a keyboard to use in place of it however it may have been much more annoying if it was someone that did not have a keyboard to use already as I would not have been able to even connect the PC to Wi-Fi without another keyboard.Once the PC was set up I haven't run into any real issues and it looks even better than I had expected.

There were a few issues with my gpu being on back order and not showing that it was on back order for 5 days after I order the PC. I will say that if I knew that they were on back order for cyberpower then i would’ve just built it myself. Regardless, once the PC came in everything ran pretty great. The PC itself has a bit of ugly hardware installations and janky looking screws. However, I believe this is due to an awkward fitting of the fans and the case itself. So far PC works without issues, 10 days after receiving. Pretty happy.

The pc arrived within a week. Overall love the the looks and the performance; Customer service was okay, I think there're only two people answering and notifying their customer when you buy something fr them, so you might get like 3 word answer when inquiring about your purchases, oh and don't pay for the professional cable wiring unless you get a big case, like the largest one they have because the cabling looks like they shove everything inside without organizing it(it's a mess). Side note, they forgot my free copy of the Starfield bundle.

Review.Titre: Great PC and build but when building a…
Review.Contenu: Great PC and build but when building a pc on their website and you’re a newbie like me, you should research first cause most of the parts they use as a default doesn’t makes sense sometimes. For example, I chose Lian Li Dynamic Evo 011 case. On the picture it comes with many fans, in reality it does not. So you actually have to add those fans.

Review.Titre: I loved how you guys were 100% ready to…
Review.Contenu: I loved how you guys were 100% ready to assist when building the pc, all the way to the delivery process. You were quick to reply and also very accommodating and transparent with everything. The pc was in great shape, perfect packaging. The only issue I had with the build was that I did not receive the founders edition 4090, but a PNY version, it would have been nice to be notified since I have no experience with PNY cards and I am not sure about their performance. Other than that, amazing service!
Almost everything went well. Would be five stars if I had actually gotten the free promotional mouse pad with it like I was supposed to, but overall a good experience.

Review.Titre: CyberPowerPC can't beat it for the price!
Review.Contenu: CyberPowerPC has done a great job with the gaming computer I recently purchased. They beat all the other pc sellers out there on price.  I also got great service and support. The only complaint I have is that the power supply I ordered was out of stock.  They notified me by email and I had to choose another one.  Despite that hiccup the service was very fast and the pc is amazing.  I was looking for an amazing gaming setup and CyberPowerPC delivered for me.

Review.Titre: Good place to shop for custom built PCs.
Review.Contenu: This is the 2nd PC I've bought from Cyberpowerpc.com. I have been satisfied with both. The only reason I gave them 4 out of 5 stars was because they missed their estimated ship date by 11 days. I know it says may take up to 21 days but missing your estimated ship date by that much was somewhat disappointing. I do recommend Cyberpowerpc.com and will probably buy from them again in the future.

Review.Titre: My computer looks and performs great
Review.Contenu: My computer looks and performs great. I knocked off one star for some minor gripes. There is a bent fin on the graphics card and it shipped 12 days after the expected ship day with no updates from them until almost three weeks after the order was placed.

The box arrived open with pc case exposed. However, no damage was found. The rgb wires for the rgb fans had come loose presumably during shipping and had been (attempted) to be fastened via electrical tape…

Review.Titre: Awesome and durable pc but lengthy shipping
Review.Contenu: I’m super happy with the easy assembly and high performance of the pc I bought! I was a little unimpressed with how long it took before it was ready to ship. It took a little over 2 weeks from when I ordered it to arrive. With that being said, I’m happy that it wasn’t rushed because my pc is very durable. Overall I had a great experience and I would highly purchase from this company again!

Throughout the process, I was told that a part I wanted was delaying the whole process, when I agreed to use the part suggested by our associate I didn't get any sort of compensation for the inconvenience. The PC is all White and arrived with a couple of dings that I had to clean up myself. The process is lengthy, and also very little communication from your reps.

Review.Titre: Great computer at a great price
Review.Contenu: Great computer at a great price. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star rating was due to extras I purchased that are just not worth it. The first being the pro wiring package. With the way the case, it would be hard to wire it any other way than how it was and the 2nd is the extra packaging on the inside of the computer. This packaging was very loose fitting and would have only provided protection from a very hard side impact that would have done extensive damage anyway. Other than those things I am very satisfied with the purchase. I couldn't come close to building it myself if I sourced the parts

Review.Titre: Computer arrived on time and well…
Review.Contenu: Computer arrived on time and well packaged but with a minor dent in the casing. All internal/important components were pristine and thus far it is all working beautifully. Very pleased.

Review.Titre: Great Builder, Great PCs, misleading build times
Review.Contenu: Ordered the PC back in October, all parts were listed as available when ordering, but as soon as I placed the order I was put on a 2 month wait for back-order. There was no mention of this during the order process. I cancelled the order and replaced it a month later, same exact situation. When I finally did receive my PC it was built to perfection (and I've ordered from them before with the same perfect results on build) and they're still the only builder I'll go with, just wish there was more direct honesty during the order process.

Review.Titre: Great Customer Service; Hastily Built Machine
Review.Contenu: Customer service was excellent before shipping out the PC. However, the PC seemed to be hastily built. After launching windows 11 for the first time, then restarting the PC for the first time... the PC entered a restart loop that could only be fixed by using the windows boot manager in the bios. Then, after finally booting into windows for the 2nd time and then trying to completely shut down the computer, Windows 11 blue screen crashed when attempting to turn the computer back on. It had to be completely reinstalled. I also discovered that the CPU fan was plugged into the wrong port on the motherboard, and was disappointed to see an ugly zip-tie job on my cables after paying extra for "professional" cable management.These problems were not a big deal for me to fix myself, but I can see how a new PC owner would have been completely panicked or put off by these same issues occurring to them.

The PC itself is very good and performs excellent. The inability for me to add any SATA drives to the boot list in the BIOS and the lack of anyone at CyberPower customer service to assist me in being able to do so is the reason for one less star. There was a SATA drive on the boot list but during troubleshooting when I first received the computer it was taken off and now cannot be added back.

Took a little bit to ship (arrived on estimate date) RAM was on the wrong speed when arrived (Easily fixed tho)Other than that build is solid, not a huge fan of Windows 11 being the only OS option but Im giving it a try. PC has ran solid haven't found a game I cant run.

Review.Titre: I have purchased at least 4 or more PCs…
Review.Contenu: I have purchased at least 4 or more PCs from the web site and one from Sam's club over the years. All though I have had issues from time to time (hence the 4 not 5 stars) I am happy with the product and service.

Friend referred me. Process was good. Website was intuitive and easy to navigate. Process time and price were very reasonable and communication was great throughout notifying me as my order progressed. Would have been 5 star but I was a little disappointed that when the PC was delivered it had finger smudges and dust on the case as well as a deep scratch on the metal side of the case. I notified the company and they sent some swag, but it cleaned up nicely anyway (I just felt it couldn’t have been me doing the cleaning) and the scratch is on the wall side of the case so it will only ever be seen when I move it out to de-dust. Will likely recommend and come back when I need another upgrade.

Review.Titre: Great cable management except the argb…
Review.Contenu: Great cable management except the argb is connected straight to the power supply not the motherboard. This means the fan lights can only be manipulated by the remote control. I’ll be looking for the argb wire and connect it to the motherboard.

this 2 time i got pc from them other then one problem it had wind come with from what i stand come from hardware more then any else it been good though if have to say any i wish can fix it fast or didnt have problem in first place

Review.Titre: PC was delivered on time and runs…
Review.Contenu: PC was delivered on time and runs great. I only give it 4 stars because the plating in the front and the power supply plating were a bit bent in I'm assuming from transit

Review.Titre: Doesn't Work (Update: RMA replacement worked flawless!)
Review.Contenu: Update: After waiting a few weeks for my replacement GPU, the replacement was received, installed and the PC now functions flawlessly! I'm changing my review from a 2 to a 4. I can't give a 5 due to the issues following shipping, but having the Warranty available was a great safety net!Upon delivery, after powering on the PC, RGB lighting, Fans worked fine, Mouse and Keyboard gets recognized, however no power was going to the GPU.After verifying cables were connected properly, still no power to the GPU. In what I was hoping was going to be a hassle free experience not having to build a PC myself, I ended up going through a bigger hassle to get this PC to work than if I were to have built it myself for less money. I've had to send the GPU back to the company and am now waiting on a replacement that I likely wont receive for another 2 weeks. Purchased my PC back on May 9th, and have yet to be able to actually use it.

Review.Titre: Great PC at a Great Price.
Review.Contenu: I don't think you'll find a better selection of components at a better price than what CyberPower offers. There were a few niggles with the ordering process, but nothing major. I'll definitely be coming back whenever I need another PC.

Review.Titre: Great prebuilt for a great price
Review.Contenu: Great prebuilt for a great price. Runs extremely well. My only issue is that they sent it to me with very little padding to account for traveling through the mail, and UPS really treated the box terribly. It arrived with every corner of the box pushed in and damp from sitting out in the rain. Not Cyberpowers fault at all, though I do think they should put more care into packaging their builds with a proper amount of padding.

It was a pretty chill and average experience, nothing too mind blowing but I did enjoy being able to see my specs in my receipt. Came in at the expected time and was delivered with no issues at all. Over all a pretty decent experience and would buy from again.

Ease of ordering and minimal time to receive order. Need to improve CPU component knowledge as I have one wire with a connector coming out of the front end of CPU GEForce RTX.  Not if it connects or is just there for future addon

Review.Titre: Love the system, hate the communication.
Review.Contenu: Love the system.  However, one star removed for the delay without ANY communication.  I had to call in and ask what was going on and even then they did not update the account until I asked them to update it later with what was happening.  So of course, they updated it within minutes of the call that it was delayed.

Review.Titre: I built a PC online during the March…
Review.Contenu: I built a PC online during the March madness sale. Used 3 day shipping. Took about 2 weeks to receive my PC, but shipping was exactly 3 days. My PC arrived in working order. Just two dents in the front removable metal grate which could have happened during shipping. My PC did come with only 1 DIMM of RAM. This was listed on my itinerary, but I didn't catch it. So, if you want an even number of DIMMs, you'll have to order that. They build a lot of computers, so it's no surprise that 1 stick will go further than 2. Overall, I'm satisfied with my order. I got exactly what I paid for. I checked everything out on pcbuilder. I will have no problem using this vendor in the future.

The computer arrived in a quick manner, however due to an issue with the graphics card, I had to send it back and wait a little longer. I'm sure Cyberpower will correct the issue as quickly as possible and send it back out to me.

Review.Titre: Everything was great except product info.
Review.Contenu: Everything was great except product information. Buyer not always is a computer expert and needs information including pictures what is what and where. I mean all inlets, outlets, buttons and hardware spots for computer extensions. The machine itself looks solid and nice.

Review.Titre: Great pc but i had couple issues
Review.Contenu: 1. Never got win 11 reinstall usb2. A test showed my ram is not running at full speed.3. No instructions on how to remove packing. Had to search for hour find a video that showed how open front of case. Took forever to remove foam as had to take it apart small piece at time to safely remove it. But on other hand did ensure no damage in shipping i think.

Review.Titre: Great out of the box, hard to upgrade
Review.Contenu: Out of the box (i.e. as configured), the machine and the experience deserved 5 stars. If you intend to use the machine exactly as shipped, you can stop reading here and assume 5 stars.However, I had bought that machine specifically to continue customizing it, explicitly with an oversized power supply and an extensible case. Adding RAM was easy. Adding an M.2 SDD was OK except for the missing screws. Adding hard drives was painfully hard, screws and cables were missing, and the power cables were not accessible. I had to redo a good amount of the wiring in order to free up the SATA power cables (and I lost the RGB fans in the process, I must have disconnected something without realizing), it's been one of the harder experiences I've had installing a hard drive in a new PC. I know that, in theory, I can add another 2 hard drives in the case, but I won't even consider it given how hard the first 2 were.Ultimately, the machine works great, with the upgrades that I wanted, but it took a lot of swearing to get it to that state, and I can only rate the overall experience 4 stars because of those upgrade difficulties.

Overall build looks clean, but I would like to have the selection of deciding intake/output fans and location. Also, they installed my GPU without a support bracket; there was a support bracket included in the GPU box, of which they didn't install it and didn't include the box in shipping.

Review.Titre: Great Computer, Quick build time, poor shipping
Review.Contenu: Easy to build and easy to get confirmed on the shipment.  Quick to get it built,  Failed to ship it right though as I had paid for 3 day shipping but got 6 day shipping instead.  A little bit difficult to get ahold of customer service as well.   But on the flip side the computer booted up and ran beautifully.

Review.Titre: The windows install was corrupt but did get fixed.
Review.Contenu: The windows install was corrupt, so I had to wipe and reinstall windows. Then 2 days later my Reverb G2 would make the screen go crazy and lockup the computer. I’ll prolly be calling on Monday.Edit: I did call. Turns out the video card was bad, so I’ll have to call for replacement.  I’ve changed my rating to 4 stars.

Review.Titre: Building it on the sight was great
Review.Contenu: Building it on the sight was great, build time was great, the product is great.  Tried getting a specific delivery time through UPS but cyber power blocked it.  That was my only issue I had

Review.Titre: I had a great buying experience with…
Review.Contenu: I had a great buying experience with Cyberpower PC I need a VR capable gaming machine and they delivered and I live across the country so I'll concern about the shipping but everything arrived intact and I was able to customize my PCs components to my preference and liking. Keep your eye for their promotions and the fun details so you don't miss out on any exclusive events!

Review.Titre: The ability to super customize the…
Review.Contenu: The ability to super customize the build you want was a highlight for me. I purchased my last system from them 8 years ago and had only 1 issue, which was resolved after a few emails. So far, this new system is screaming fast meets my expectations.I had only 1 issue when making the purchase of the new system. I spec'ed it out and made the purchase on a Friday night. On Sunday, I went and checked the system over again to show someone the specifications and noticed there was a $50 discount I did not put a check mark in to apply the discount. I sent an email and the reply on Monday was that I would need to cancel my order and place a new order. At that time, every other discount still applied, so modifying the order to apply that discount seemed like an easy billing solution. They put the order on hold until I told them just to process the order. I did not have the time to cancel an order and place the identical order so I could get a billing discount. This is something the company should work on. Having to cancel an order (which was already billed to my credit card), and then place the same exact order to get a billing discount is not good customer service.

Review.Titre: I wish all the parts that came with my…
Review.Contenu: I wish all the parts that came with my individual pieces were sent along with the system. This being my third (I think) system from you guys I didnt expect to not have everything. I checked videos and manufacture sites for what in the box of each. As an example I didnt have m.2 screws and sata cables from my case. That said the computer runs fine so far and seems like its in good shape. I am sure I will buy from you again. Thanks

Computer is amazing, exactly what I wanted. However, the antennas on the back need to be replaced because they were broke off in the box.  That was an easy fix (but shouldn’t needed to be fixed really)… to get new ones off Amazon only cost me $8.  Also, the glass door was put on a little bit crooked so it couldn’t close. A little adjustment helped!  Good computer so far though

Review.Titre: Good build, just don't expect service with a smile.
Review.Contenu: PC arrived well put together and in a reasonable time, however the communications with CyberpowerPC left something to be desired. The standard form emails about where the build is in the process are fine, bit I had a couple questions about billing and cost (they couldn't rush the build), and the responses I got were curt to the point of being rude.
Day after ordering a pre-built pc I was able to update the components easily through the support team. Only thing left to be desired would be a less expensive and faster shipping cost.
The constant updates on my order was quick, detailed, and helpful.  Not the first time doing business with CyberPower, and it won’t be the last either.

Review.Titre: I liked that I could configure my system from many choices
Review.Contenu: I liked that I could configure my system from many choices.  I also like the assistance provided by your sales staff.  I feel CyberPowerPC uses quality established components.My CyberPowerPC is running terrific.  Booted up right out of the box without any issues.  After I received my PC, the support staff did a good job answering my questions and concerns.  I appreciate that My PC arrived without unsolicited bloatware.  One can find a good PC at whatever price level you find comfortable.  I prefer desktops where one can get into and upgrade with extra drives and more memory should it be necessary.

I do not build computers, I just use them to run my software in video and photo editing.  The process in purchasing an up to date system was simple and my choices were easily understood. nothing is cheap if you want quality products and CyberPowerPC gave me the choice I needed which is working to my best performance and capabilities. Thank you CyberPowerPC

Review.Titre: Over the years CyberPower has improved…
Review.Contenu: Over the years CyberPower has improved with it's dedication of good customer care and I really appreciate that.  Always good builds and fast service. The only thing I miss is the free shipping during Black Friday as it was always the thing that got me into the spirit of purchasing a new computer, this year though, no free shipping.  So that was a bummer!

Very quick order placed>order received timing. Did opt to get the professional wiring and was more than satisfied with the result. The Lian Li Dynamic Evo XL case did have a couple of deformities and the front panel doesn't line up quiiiiite perfect. But it is pretty minor and I can look past that with how excellent everything else is/was.
Ran into a couple different software bugs during setup (pretty typical) and the support guys who helped me get them worked out were super helpful. They made fixing the bugs super easy and quick.
Only had 2 weeks. So far a wonderful rig. Loving the upgrade. Whisper quiet. Kudos to CYBERPOWERPC. I believe this is my fourth pc from them. Very pleased
They were quick to build, the system was well packaged and when I received the computer everything was tight and neatly arranged in the case.

Review.Titre: Great build that was completed quickly…
Review.Contenu: Great build that was completed quickly and shipped FAST!  This is my 3rd computer with Cyber Power, and they've never disappointed.

I got an awesome black friday deal with them - easily cheaper than even getting the best black friday deals on components and building the computer myself. They built the computer in a timely manner, packaged it VERY well, and shipped it quickly. Everything in perfect working order and perfect condition. I am very impressed!

Very good website, easy to find what you're looking for. Lots options for each component, with updated pricing as you modify the options. Pricing was very competitive. Order process very was easy, and I was kept updated along each step of the order, build, and shipping stages. PC arrived in a well packaged, secure box. My only 'complaint' is that you have to get the PC with Windows (though every other dealer is the same so nothing really against CyberPower). For the majority of people that's what they are after, but I'm a Linux user, so having to pay for Windows when I didn't want it, was the only downside. Maybe add an option for no OS? All-in-all a great buying experience and I would highly recommend them.
Great packaging, easy to unbox and ready to use with software like Adrenaline. Also, the case is easy to open and looks nice while on.
Easy to order. Deals were great on black froday. Received the product in a timely manner. Overall, great experience.

Review.Titre: Ordering was easy and delivery was…
Review.Contenu: Ordering was easy and delivery was fast. I was kept informed via text and email every step of the way.  I was able to order the components I wanted and received a professional build. The system was packed well and arrived safe despite UPS.

My computer is awesome! I love everything about it. I do love how you can customize the entire PC to be what you want it to be. The computer runs without a flaw and i have already started to play games on it! The updates were helpful when buying my PC. I knew it was around Black Friday and I wasn’t the only one who was getting a PC. My computer arrived undamaged and fired out out of the box! I would absolutely recommend using this company and I know that I will in the future when my daughter needs an upgrade.
Good price on the Black Friday sale. Reasonable shipping speed. Good build quality. Used them a few times and never had problems.
Easy to buy online. Great communication from the company about each step of the orders process.  Thank you

This is my 3rd or 4th computer bought at CyberPower, and by far the nicest one I've received. It has all the items I ordered, plus a light show I wasn't expecting, that really shows off the glass case the computer came with. Real nice inside with all the wiring neatly bound, no tangle of wires to get in your way if you decide to add on later.

Review.Titre: Quality at a better than fair price. Very satisfied.
Review.Contenu: 4th system I have purchased.  Great price and great components. Also good service when needed.
Easy to order online, great price, quick service, looks amazing and had very easy set up!

Configuring my computer and choosing the accessories was a breeze. Communicate after the fact was regular so I always knew what stage the build was in. The shipping company delivered a damaged unit and the support team was very prompt in sending out the replacement parts. The computer is incredible. It’s every hoped it would be and more.
Great options, shipped quick, ran out of the box. Bought for my wife to play VR games. Runs cool and quiet, no fuss, no muss. I'll be coming back for another PC in the future.
Fast production time. Everything was assembled professionally and came with instructions to help me get started. Would definitely buy another computer from these guys!

Review.Titre: More than I could have hoped for
Review.Contenu: Was really happy with the support team and the guys sending out my order as after I reached out to them with concerns I was given a timely response both through an email and calls to my phone. Really helps settle the nerves when making these big purchases.

All was as advertised.  I handed it over to my tech friend and the report is that, so far, the machine functions very well.There was some confusion AFTER the purchase, however.  The laptop I bought was advertised as PRE-BUILT and so NO CHANGES were allowed (such as increasing RAM).  One of the first messages I received was nonetheless that my computer was in the warehouse phase with parts being collected for computer assembly.I asked about this and your rep said it was a computer auto-generated message.  That seems an inappropriate excuse if one is SELLING computers.

Review.Titre: I needed a replacement PC ASAP
Review.Contenu: I needed a replacement PC ASAP so I ordered a prebuilt from CyberPowerPC with a 2-day delivery. I had to call them per their request. I imagine this was to verify the purchase. After this call the unit shipped. I got it the next day. You don’t know the exact brand of many components when you order one of these. Turns out these components were all decent brands and not bottom line versions. I also had a question and was able to talk to person for technical support without a long wait. I’m very pleased with this purchase.
Came earlier than expected which is great, runs excellent.

Review.Titre: As always an excellent work on my PC
Review.Contenu: As always an excellent work on my PC, it arrived in perfect condition, shipping and build was done pretty fast even considering it was during the holidays when ordered it, very nice discounts and everything works the way it should, definitely coming back in the future.

Excellent service. I typically build my own systems and this was the first time I ordered a pre built one. Customizing was a breeze. Very easy to use with lots of different options. My build arrived in perfect condition and booted up without any issues.
Shipped and received on time. PC was in perfect condition. Good pricing on quality parts

Review.Titre: great company and products never had…
Review.Contenu: great company and products never had any issue  will be ordering more in future
Great customer support and speedy service for how busy they are

Review.Titre: Id give them a 4.8 if I could
Review.Contenu: Id give them a 4.8 if I could, but Id much rather go the full 5 than 4.Build and shipping time exceeded my expectations. Packaging was great and  the build was clean. Only non Microsoft bloat installed was Norton and I appreciated that. The free mouse and keyboard didn't come with any instructions on how set the RGB. Same with the RAM. They are currently stuck in a rainbow pattern. The free Mouse and Keyboard are about as good as you would expect them to be...as in not very so I will be replacing them anyway. Overall I am very happy with my purchase. I would buy from them again.
Very prompt response to email. Kept me informed iof status of my order. Courteous. Quick delivery.

Review.Titre: Great products for as great price
Review.Contenu: Great products for as great price, quick turnaround after order even with special orders
Great products. This is my 3rd PC purchase from them and all are still performing at optimal levels.

The computer is great. Your production time is too long. This is my 3 or 4th order from you and production takes so many days. However, I will still buy from you because the computers you make are so good
SMOOTH ORDERING AND DELIVERY PROCESS. IT HELPS THAT I LIVE ONE TOWN OVER FROM THE FACTORY!

Review.Titre: Great product, Nice price, pleasant experience.
Review.Contenu: The PC I purchased was a prebuilt with the specs I was looking for, and the price was very comfortable with my budget. The only hitch in the process was MY Credit Card's "Fraud Watch", which blocked the first attempted purchase, but after I calmed them down, and called CyberPower back to ask them to rerun the card, everything went smooth. The product arrived on time, was SUPER clean and neatly constructed, and has worked flawlessly!
Good price/discount, arrived in time and in good shape/packaging. Worked great since.

Cyberpower did fantastic. The sales team and the people who answered my inquiries were kind, efficient and very helpful. The PC and the packaging of the PC arrived fast and well put together. The only thing I would suggest for Cyberpower is adding in manuals for new PC/Windows users. I switched from Mac for Creativity and workstation purposes so their has been a bit of a learning curve but that's obviously not CyberPower's fault or problem. :)
Great service, Can not believe what a great system i got for the price i paid.Would recommend this company to my friends
My sixth Cyberpower gaming computer.  Showed up to the house early and in perfect working order!  Love this company- fast machines, great pricing, great service!
Quick and easy service.  User interface and selection is the reason I chose cyberpower.
They kept me informed every step of the way. The computer works great.
It was a wonderful process through and through! The guide to starting up the PC was also a nice add-on!
My PC was made quickly and exactly how I wanted it. The quality of the build is incredible and I am extremely satisfied with the performance.

Review.Titre: No issues with the computer so far
Review.Contenu: No issues with the computer so far, drivers are up to date already... I chose the wrong color for my wiring so it looks a little weird but that's on me 😔.
Excellent customer service and communication. The delivery was ahead of schedule and the product was in great condition when received.

Review.Titre: Excellent Build Quality, Love my new rig!
Review.Contenu: I couldn't be more satisfied with my purchase. The system's performance is outstanding, effortlessly handling demanding tasks The build quality is excellent, and the customer service was top-notch. CyberPowerPC has delivered a powerhouse that equaled my expectations. I highly recommend it to those seeking a premium experience.
I'm beyond happy with my PC and the time it took to build and ship. Anytime I contacted CyberPower they responded right away. I would recommend thus company to anyone looking for a pre-built PC.
It was shipped on time packaged well and works like it should at a good price.
This is the 2nd computer that I've purchased from you guys. Everything that I ordered showed up quickly and works exactly as described. Happy to have my new machine. Thanks you!

Review.Titre: From beginning to end was a great…
Review.Contenu: From beginning to end was a great experience! Everything showed up on time and worked right out of the box! My 4070 is a beast.
Thoughoughly impressed with the computer that I ordered.

There was an out of stock product I selected and the team reached out quickly. I was able to make a new selection in a very short time frame. This allowed my rush processing to continue. The team continued to keep me updated through the process. I find this can be the most important aspect in customer service. I always felt well informed. I appreciate the efforts.

Review.Titre: Computer arrived quickly and in perfect…
Review.Contenu: Computer arrived quickly and in perfect condition and is an absolute beast

Amazing product, built and shipped extremely fast. Product looks and surpasses expectations. This is my 3rd build from CyberpowerPC and would highly recommend for anyone looking for a customizable Laptop or PC.
Bought PC. It was delivered on time without issues

Excellent and quick customer service. Solved my shipping issues within the hour. Product works great and have been playing BG3 and Starfield on ultra without issue. Easy unboxing and set up even for someone like me without any PC experience. Love you guys.

Steve was really helpful whoever he was. I did have an issue where the delivery date was set for a time where I was at work as I work nights and the only option that was offered to me was for me to do a pick up but I would have to send pictures of my drive license and credit card. Which made me a little uncomfortable to do that. I wish I was able to just get the delivery date change

Review.Titre: Picked up one of the daily deals
Review.Contenu: Picked up one of the daily deals. Only took about a week for CyberPower to build it and ship it to my front door .. plugged it in - hooked it up .. and everything worked. This is my second CyberPower rig. The first one is still going strong after 7 years, but I needed a newer set-up for some heavy photo and video editing.

Website - easy to use to chose components that fit together with instant pricing updates. Warnings if components aren't compatible.Fast turnaround.I always research other choices but CyberPower has always had the best prices for high-end computer builds. I've purchased 3,  $3k and 2 $5k systems.

Review.Titre: Don’t miss out on an amazing Cyberpower experience!
Review.Contenu: Communicative and easy to work with. Building the computer online was simple and you can’t beat the options! Graphics card took longer than I expected for cyberpower to obtain but they kept me in the loop and the final build is beautiful! Computer was completely ready to go straight from the box. I’ve used it with settings cranked to the max in every big game I have for the last month and the computer has performed flawlessly. Definitely worth the price!

Review.Titre: CyberPowerPC: Super Customize Your New PC
Review.Contenu: Well designed website. Good customer service. A lot of options to choose from. Do you homework first. Have additional options in case certain items are not in stock. Timely build and delivery when all parts are available. Well recommended.
Quick and efficient service. The initial building phase is very beginner friendly.Shipping was fast and the product arrived In great condition.

Review.Titre: Extremely satisfied frequent flyer with CyberPowerPC
Review.Contenu: I have had 9 different computers built by CyberPower to date. All of them have been everything they claim to be. Yes, there are times when there is a small issue. I have had a graphics card that was DOA or a stick of RAM that the RGBs didn’t work. However, CyberPower always takes care of it immediately. On average I get about 7 years before I really need to replace a system and that isn’t because it stops working. It is because the technology has developed beyond what the PC can handle. This last purchase was no exception. I ordered on 14 October and it was delivered on 20 October. That was with customizations. I will keep purchasing from CyberPower. They haven’t let me down yet.

Everything went well. I was originally going to get from iBuyPower but they use some kind of fraud detection that doesn't work locking me out of buying. Came here got almost the same stuff for cheaper and faster. Plus better warranty and keyboard and mouse

Everything I have ever bought from this company has been top quality. They really seem to take pride in their work. Have never had an issue with the seven different computers I’ve bought from them. Good job guys and keep up the great work.
No problems, computer works well and was shipped securely. They were helpful and I was kept up to date on my order.

Review.Titre: Cyber Power is my only choice for OC,
Review.Contenu: I have purchase Cyber Power PC 12 years ago and the pc lasted me 12 years, it actually still works today except the fans are going out. The only thing I have upgraded over the years was the video card.  But now its time for a new pc I knew I wanted something that lasted the time. I bought from same place, same guy and same company hardware.

Review.Titre: Really pleased with my PC have had no…
Review.Contenu: Really pleased with my PC have had no issues

By choice, I installed a M2 before first boot. Had to remove 4090 (vertical) and open entire case. No issues installing. In twenty minutes I was tweaking settings happily.  Very clean build and has worked flawlessly. This is my 3rd prebuilt from Cyberpower and I would buy again. First was a 2080/intel, then 3080/intel and now 4090/intel. All are still running with no issues. Sold one and my son has one.You guys do a great job and thank you!(I wish CYberpower would pay me for this review!!)

I bought a prebuilt computer and paid extra for the foam insert in the case to prevent damage during transport. However, the graphics card arrived damaged. There was no physical damage but it clearly did not work. That said it was very easy to request a replacement, and the shipping was paid for. It took about two weeks between when I shipped out the old graphics card and when I received my new one. And the new one works. I'm still giving five stars despite it not working out of the box because the return process was easy, and even though I had to wait a little longer than I was hoping for, everything turned out great in the end.
Easy ordering, tracking. And fast delivery. Parts came exactly as ordered, pc works great! I couldn't  e happier with my purchase.
Good, reliable parts were used on my computer and it was easy for me to put together the components online.  The machine is a beast!
Great price. Great service. Fast shipping.
Ordering was easy.  Shipping was fast.  Communication about shipping, signatures and arrival date was very clear.

Within 7 days of my order, my customized PC was delivered! All I had to do was connect the included keyboard and monitor after everything was set up. I've had the rig for two days now, and it works well! They spoke with me frequently via email and kept me informed at every stage of the procedure. Without a doubt, I would suggest CyberPowerPC to everyone!
production, shipping(I used enhanced), delivery, quality, everything went and is perfect from my view point.   will shop again in the future

I always shop CyberPower. To me it's the best priced computers on the market. I have never been disappointed with the quality or the customer service from this company. I do look at other companies just to shop around but in the end it's always back to CyberPower.

Review.Titre: Very easy to customize your choice
Review.Contenu: It is very easy to customize your choice.  Fast service and very well-built PC.  I am extremely satisfied with this product and service.
Everything was in place inside the package, and all the paper instructions were clear.

Review.Titre: Excellent Tech, Customer Service and Longevity of my last PC
Review.Contenu: I received my PC and it was damaged in shipping. I called tech support and explained to him I got nothing when I plugged the PC in, ie, no lights on the MB. I had tried 2 different back-ups and a power strip just to be sure. He issued a return shipping label with in minutes. I sent it back and they turned it around in a day. I had been told it could take as long as the original build. I could not have asked for better tech and customer service. My new PC runs like a champ.I also have a PC built by Cyberpower in 2017. It's still going strong. I have an issue with the connection between my PC and any web browser because of the last security update of Windows 11. I can still play on-line games with no problem. It is a software issue and software is not my forte. I had absolutely no issues until the update and you can't delete a security update...believe me I tried. Yet, I can run GW2, Fortnight, Destiny2, and many other games with no problems. It's still a powerhouse, runs smoothly for programs and any game you want to play! I still love my PC after all these years.

This is my second time getting a damn well good pc from them even though it wasn't for another 8 years. I love how they reach out to you on matters concerning what changes were made and adapting to them on the fly (at least for me this time). A shout out to Warren Lee for getting me my birthday present on time and updated. I will recommend them to my pals and people looking for good services. I don't expect much from anyone and when they do I give credit.
2nd computer from them after 8 years. Fantastic and timely service. Professional wiring. Neat and tidy. Love them.
The PC is Fantastic. Case and cords look amazing and runs great. Had a small problem but 1 quick email and I am getting the fix sent to me with no hassle!
Ordering was fast and easy. Communication was great and product worked flawlessly

Review.Titre: They were fast and will help you with…
Review.Contenu: They were fast and will help you with any and all questions, and my pc got there with no damage and it's as quiet as a mouse, I love it

I loved the pc, just got a 4070 with a i9 with 64 gb ram it is perfect on every single game I play it’s really good. I would recommend 100% the people that built my pc where amazing! Also the temperature inside of the pc is amazing.

Review.Titre: My last tower I got in 2018 and is…
Review.Contenu: My last tower I got in 2018 and is still working just fine, but I was due and upgrade. This will be my 4th purchase from Cyberpower PC. And for the 4th time, I am very happy with my purchase. It came well packaged, I just had to plug my tower in, and I was running in no time. I had a slight issue (my own user error haha) that customer service was very patient with me and in general customer service has always been great and clear when getting back to me.
Excellent build, great customer service throughout the process!  I would highly recommend them for gaming builds!!

Review.Titre: This is fourth machine we have bought…
Review.Contenu: This is fourth machine we have bought from CyberPowerPC. I’m replacing my six year old computer and couldn’t be happier.
Easy to navigate the website, find what I wanted and pay.

Review.Titre: Fast service and computer works well
Review.Contenu: Fast service and computer works well! Got my custom shortly after my order!
works just how i wanted it to, amazing.
I was able to customize my build to my specifications. The price was excellent. The build quality is excellent.
Excellent sales service! It was easy to switch out a part and change shipping speed. The build is phenomenal and I'm incredibly happy with the sales and service experience.
Well built, all cables organized properly, I couldn't be happier with my pc!
ordered a dasmehdi 100 with some custom changes.  everything working perfect, recieved very well packed, no complaints.
